subject: College Athletics
Colleges and Universities
Scholarships and Fellowships
lead_paragraph: All 10 universities in the Colonial Athletic Association are requesting an override of a vote that granted substantial governing autonomy to the Big 5 conferences, but those universities are just about the only ones to do so.
snippet: All 10 universities in the Colonial Athletic Association are requesting an override of a vote that granted substantial governing autonomy to the Big 5 conferences, but those universities are just about the only ones to do so.
